metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3865 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The Runtime subsystem in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allows attackers togain privileges via a crafted application, as demonstrated by obtainingSignature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 23050463.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
